mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_id = #{member_id}
select member_email from member where member_email = #{member_email}
mapper.insert: insert into member (member_id, member_pw, member_name, post_no, member_addr1, member_addr2, member_tel, mobile, mgender, member_email, mbirth) values(#{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{post_no}, #{member_addr1}, #{member_addr2}, #{member_tel}, #{mobile}, #{mgender}, #{member_email}, #{mbirth})
mapper.update: update member set member_name = #{member_name}, post_no = #{post_no}, member_addr1 = #{member_addr1}, member_addr2 = #{member_addr2}, member_tel = #{member_tel}, mobile = #{mobile}, mlevel = #{mlevel}, mgender = #{mgender}, member_email = #{member_email}, mbirth = #{mbirth} where member_id = #{member_id}
update member set member_pw = #{new_member_pw}, change_passwd_date = now() where member_id = #{member_id}

UPDATE member SET member_name = #{member_name}, member_addr1 = #{member_addr1}, member_addr2 = #{member_addr2}, member_email = #{member_email}, mobile = #{member_tel} WHERE member_code = #{member_code}
